remarks: Fourier coefficients for the square wave function.  Since the square function is an odd function, there is no contribution from the ` A ` coefficients.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

sqwvfoura $p |- ( ph -> ( S. ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( N x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) = 0 ) $.
$d N x $.
